CustomField.formula: RPAD("0", 2,TEXT(FLOOR(FLOOR((systemModstamp__c- createdDate__c)*86400) / 3600))) + ":" + RPAD("0", 2,TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(FLOOR((systemModstamp__c- createdDate__c)*86400),3600) / 60))) + ":" + RPAD("0", 2,TEXT(FLOOR(MOD(MOD(FLOOR((systemModstamp__c- createdDate__c)*86400),3600) , 60))))
CustomField.label: Duraci√≥n
